rooms.description: A compact, eco-friendly entrance featuring natural stone and reclaimed wood finish that welcomes guests.
An open-plan living area with sustainable LED lighting, natural ventilation and large windows to enhance brightness. Vastu aligned orientation for positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living room, designed with eco-friendly materials and featuring a green wall element for improved air quality.
A compact, energy-efficient kitchen using modern appliances and low VOC finishes. Positioned to ensure optimal Vastu principles.
The main bedroom combining living and sleeping areas in a versatile space with natural ventilation and eco-friendly insulation.
An efficiently designed bathroom with water-saving fixtures, sustainable materials and proper placement per Vastu guidelines.

openings.location: Throughout living, dining and bedroom areas
openings.description: Large windows ensuring natural ventilation and daylighting; south and east orientations are favored per Vastu.

central_courtyard.description: A serene central courtyard featuring native landscaping, rainwater harvesting system and permeable paving to enhance eco-sustainability. It is strategically positioned for optimal sunlight and energy flow.

home_theater.description: An integrated home theater within the living room with acoustic treatments, projector screen and ambient lighting; designed to minimize noise leakage while maintaining Vastu alignment.
